title: Jigsaw Podcast
description: Jigsaw was my first serious experience in making Persian podcasts, which was made possible with Saro and Aylin collaboration. In each episode of the Jigsaw Podcast, we pick an influential idea for a society and try to understand the good, the bad and the ugly of it.

title: Sinata Podcast
description: Sina Shafizadeh, in each episode of his podcast tells a data-driven story which tries to makes you enjoy thinking. I help him with technical stuff of podcast.
